title: that one coward riven nerf
body:
Quickdraw
Stack limit increased to 8 from 4.
NEW EFFECT: Now grants 2 stacks if you dash toward an enemy champion.
Resistances per stack reduced to 5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 from 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30.

i wouldnt say theres 60 combos with riven but you are defiinitely wrong in saying that there are only 3

(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uvIJBvNBZkw)

And there are still more.

Riven is a build your own combo as the combat progresses champion.

Ok, let me be more specific:

There are only two or three combos that achieve slightly different things in their execution but ultimately the same thing.

Let's take another combo champ: {{champion:13}} 

Let's say your enemy is immobile and melee. E-Q is a standard, but if they are someone with a MS boost or something you can adapt a W before your E for nice harass. If your enemy happens to be extremely dangerous when not CC'd at the range you're attacking them, you can E-W and Q for the reset.

Combos? E-Q, W-E-Q, or E-W-Q for just one type of champion.

Mobile champ? E-W-Q if their mobility isn't instant, W-E-Q if instant mobility, etc.

This is from a champion with 3 simple abilities. He has more combos than a champ who weaves in autos in her combos (and no, alterations of pressing Q at different intervals should not count as a combo since that is simply permutation).

I can give better examples, but I want to see what you say first.
Yes, it would Riven's gameplay much more binary. Not only that, it would also add to her already feast and famine nature which would be quite the balance problem.
